00005 //! Implements a camera and stores its parameter 
00006 /*! The camera is defined by its position, focus point, clipping plane 
00007 and some other parameters.*/
00008 class Camera {
00009 public:
00010         //! virtual camera position in 3D space
00011         Vector  eyep;
00012 
00013         //! focus point of camera
00014         Vector  lookp;
00015 
00016         //! direction pointing upward
00017         Vector  updir;          
00018 
00019         //! distance from eyepoint to focus point
00020         float   viewdist;               
00021 
00022         //! half of the field of view, horizontal and vertical, in degrees.
00023         float   fov, hfov, vfov;
00024 
00025         //! near and far clipping plane distance
00026         float   nearClip, farClip;      
00027 
00028         //! horizontal and vertical resolution
00029         long    hres, vres;             
00030                 
00031         //! eye coordinate system (right-hand-orientation): X=right
00032         Vector  X;
00033 
00034         //! eye coordinate system (right-hand-orientation): Y=down
00035         Vector  Y;
00036 
00037         //! eye coordinate system (right-hand-orientation): Z=viewing direction
00038         Vector  Z;
00039 
00040         //! Width and height of a pixel
00041         float   pixh, pixv;
00042 
00043         //! Precomputed values (tangens of hfov and vfov) 
00044         float   tanFovH, tanFovV;       
00045 
00046 public:
00047         Camera ();
00048         void CompleteCamera ();
00049 
00050 };
